title: How a software update from cyber firm CrowdStrike caused one of the world’s biggest IT blackouts
content: A fault with an update issued by cybersecurity company CrowdStrike led to a cascade effect among global IT systems Friday.
summary: A fault with an update issued by cybersecurity company CrowdStrike led to a cascade effect among global IT systems Friday.

title: Microsoft, CrowdStrike IT outage hits global supply chain, with air freight facing days or weeks to recover

title: Asia-Pacific markets track Wall Street slide on tech sell-off; Japan headline inflation holds steady
